name: Marble Sandbox 3D
description:
Do you love marble machines but have horrible woodworking skills? Well then this is the game for you! Design and build marble machines and sit back and feel the maximum satisfaction filling your body.

From corkscrews, wheel lifts, stair lifts, bouncy drums, halfpipes, and more! 27 parts are included in the full version (with more to come!)

It's not just regular 3D, either. Hit the 3D button at the top to activate 3D glasses mode! With just a regular pair of red/cyan 3D glasses, you can make your marble experience POP!

Demo version has a limit to the number of parts you can use and not all parts are available. Purchase the full version to get more stuff.
